title.rendered: The Hon. Minister of Foreign Affairs, H.E. Geoffrey Onyeama presented Nigerian Global Business Match (NGBM) to the Hon. Minister of Industry, Trade and Investment, Otunba Niyi Adebayo at the FMITI

content.rendered:
The Hon. Minister of Foreign Affairs, H.E. Geoffrey Onyeama presented Nigerian Global Business Match (NGBM) to the Hon. Minister of Industry, Trade and Investment, Otunba Niyi Adebayo at the FMITI today, 3rd April, 2023.
The NGBM is an initiative of the YOUWIN Connectrun jointly with the FMITI to match-make Local Business Entities (LBE) with Foreign Business Entities (FBE) in a quest to promote global trade and investment.
Present at the meeting was the Hon. Minister of State (FMITI) Amb. Mariam Katagum, and Permanent Secretary (FMITI), Mrs. Evelyn Ngige among other senior government officials.
